Short and simple, these PDFs are for GMs and players who know how to integrate new ideas into their campaigns without any hand-holding, and just need fresh ideas and the rules to support them. No in-character fiction setting the game world. No charts and tables. No sidebars of explanations and optional rules. Just one sentence of explanation for the High Concept of the PDF, then bullet points.

The High Concept: Eight feats designed to augment the options and utility of dragonriders (from The Genius Guide to the Dragonrider).

The feats included are:


Draconic Focus
Draconic Fury
Dragon Warrior
Eldritch Link
Elemental Arrows
Fearsome Steed
Fuel for the Fire
Wings of the Rider


User note: this product is available as a free download.

115743.name: Stop 'n Go
115743.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Stop 'n Go is a quick action card game in which play is driven by hand-eye coordination and quick responses. Players race to be the first to get rid of their cards by matching colors and watching out for special cards: Zap, Pass, and Stop 'n Go!

115744.name: Sumioni: Demon Arts
115744.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – IN DEVELOPMENT




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it, nor add new releases.




In Sumioni – literally, “ink demon” – players take control of a Sumioni ink demon that has been summoned to rid the land of evil, and are tasked with safely guiding him through 2D side-scrolling levels. Visuals are presented using a crisp, hand-painted traditional “sumi-e” ink style and a color palette designed to mesh well with the game’s feudal Japanese setting. Players will encounter enemy samurai, long-range bowmen, and other obstacles that must be overcome using the touchscreen controls of the PS Vita system.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115745.description:
"Bare Your Fangs: The Hunt is On" is an expansion to the "Bare Your Fangs" game and requires the core game to play. It adds a third active player by replacing the non-player-character (NPC) Hunter die with 5 new customized Hunter character dice. The NPC dice can be kept in case there aren't 3 active players. Also included is a bloodstone life tracker and rules, which will fit and be shipped in the zippered game pouch.

Now up to 3 people can battle royale! As with the core game, multiple copies will allow for team play.
115745.name: Bare Your Fangs: The Hunt is On

115746.description:
In War of the Ring, one player takes control of the Free Peoples (FP), the other player controls Shadow Armies (SA). Initially, the Free People Nations are reluctant to take arms against Sauron, so they must be attacked by Sauron or persuaded by Gandalf or other Companions, before they start to fight properly: this is represented by the Political Track, which shows if a Nation is ready to fight in the War of the Ring or not.

The game can be won by a military victory, if Sauron conquers a certain number of Free People cities and strongholds or vice versa. But the true hope of the Free Peoples lies with the quest of the Ringbearer: while the armies clash across Middle Earth, the Fellowship of the Ring is trying to get secretly to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring. Sauron is not aware of the real intention of his enemies but is looking across Middle Earth for the precious Ring, so that the Fellowship is going to face numerous dangers, represented by the rules of The Hunt for the Ring. But the Companions can spur the Free Peoples to the fight against Sauron, so the Free People player must balance the need to protect the Ringbearer from harm, against the attempt to raise a proper defense against the armies of the Shadow, so that they do not overrun Middle Earth before the Ringbearer completes his quest.

Each game turn revolves around the roll of Action Dice: each die corresponds to an action that a player can do during a turn. Depending on the face rolled on each die, different actions are possible (moving armies, characters, recruiting troops, advancing a Political Track).

Action dice can also be used to draw or play Event Cards. Event Cards are played to represent specific events from the story (or events which could possibly have happened) which cannot be portrayed through normal game-play. Each Event Card can also create an unexpected turn in the game, allowing special actions or altering the course of a battle.
115746.name: War of the Ring (Second Edition)
boardgamepodcastepisode: BGA Episode 100 - Top 100 Games of All Time
Board2Death Podcast Episode 5 - Introductions Round One
Episode 26 - Francesco Nepitello; Co-designer of War of the Ring
I've Been Diced! episode 30: The games that got away
I've Been Diced! episode 31: Three player games
Low Player Count - Ep. 21 - Our Top 5 Two Player Games
Show #24: Redux of our Top Ten Games Lists
The Gaming Gang Episode 38: Lords of Waterdeep, Hibernia, War of the Ring, and Marvel Heroic Roleplaying
The Good, The Board and The Creep:  Episode 44 “Daniel’s Top Ten”
The Long View: War of the Ring
제83회 게임 대 게임 - 반지 전쟁 vs. 왕좌의 게임

115747.name: Duelo Final
115747.description:
It's a fencing tournament, where they can participate 2 to 8 players simultaneously. It is a game dominated intuition, but also requires a little strategy to determine which will be the action most suitable sensing and analyzing the possibilities of the rival.

Actions on Pedana are carried out contemporary, following a timeline, with a dynamic system that determines a number of actions variable simultaneously on each shift.

---

Es un torneo de esgrima, donde pueden participar de 2 a 8 jugadores en forma simultánea.

Es un juego donde predomina la intuición, pero que requiere también un poco de estrategia para determinar cuales serán las acciones mas convenientes, intuyendo y analizando las posibilidades del rival.

Las acciones sobre la pedana se realizan en forma contemporánea, siguiendo una línea de tiempo, con un sistema dinámico que determina un número de acciones simultáneas variable en cada turno

115748.name: Master of the Monster Lair
115748.description:
Dream it, design it, dig it… then explore it! In order to trap the freeloading monsters of South Arc, you must become the architect of a vast labyrinth, crafting intricate levels designed to lure and capture all manner of beasts. Every monster disposed of offers the promise of new weapons and items, allowing for more unique dungeon designs and more efficient means of ridding South Arc of the nasty baddies.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115749.name: Zoids Assault
115749.description:
When war broke out between the world's two main superpowers, the Guylos Empire and the Republic of Helic, the effects rippled across the globe, dragging other nations into the fight. Two such nations were Maroll and Jamil. After a mysterious explosion at one of Maroll's military bases, two covert ops teams are sent into Jamil territory, their exact mission details never disclosed. Somehow, the events of the present are inextricably linked to the past - to the final days of the war, ten years ago ...

Source: The Publisher Website.

115750.name: Ontamarama
115750.description:
Fast reflexes and a keen sense of rhythm are the keys to success in this frantic, fun, and addictive music-based game! Ontamarama provides an entertaining level of challenge for novice players, while offering satisfying modes for advanced gamers.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115751.name: Monster Kingdom: Jewel Summoner
115751.description:
There was a time when mankind and monsters coexisted in peace, but The Great Disaster put an end to that era. The world changed radically, with all the monsters of the planet disappearing in an instant, leaving behind only jewels that radiated tremendous energy. This energy source became known as jewel power and enabled the survivors to revive their civilization. Now, the peace achieved through jewel power has been endangered by a new threat. Strange Abominations have mysteriously appeared and unleashed legions of monsters on the helpless populace. To combat them, an organization known as the Order was established to study jewels and harness their power. Their research led to the formation of an elite class of warriors called Jewel Summoners, those with the power to summon monsters from jewels and control them in combat. With the aid of the Order, it is up to these powerful Jewel Summoners to restore peace once again!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115752.name: Anima Tactics: Faust Orbatos
115752.description:
As the last member of the renowned Orbatos lineage, Faust is a man marked by a dark destiny. After the destruction of his entire family, now this unmatched warrior wanders the world looking for his destiny, even if it takes him to the depths of hell.

Neutral Wanderer Warrior - Lv. 60

At 5 | Dm 5 | Df 9 | Ar 4 | LP: 16 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

oo - Scorpion Grip (Ki, Effect)
Cast Lv2 Slow on an enemy target unit inside Faust's Control Zone. Effect 14.

ooo - Dark Cross (Ki, Attack)
Special Impact. +6 Attack.

ooo - Hakkai Zangetsu (Ki, Attack)
Special Impact. +6 Attack / -6 Armor. To use this Attack Faust must sacrifice 3 Life Points.

115753.name: Anima Tactics: Jiang Pao
115753.description:
The cheerful and carefree Jiang Pao wanders throughout the world without more concern than having a good time and flirting with beautiful women. However, despite his easy going appearance, he hides an indomitable fighting spirit forged by the best martial masters of the Maisen Academy.

Neutral Wanderer Warrior - Lv. 40

At 5 | Dm 2 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP: 12 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5

o - Flow like the Wind (Ki, Dodge)

+ 3 Defense. Flow like the Wind only works against Ranged Attacks. This skill can not be used if Jiang Pao is executing a Shield maneuver.

ooo - Gale of Blows (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack. If Gail of Blows causes any damage, target unit loses one action counter. Effect 15.

A part of Team The Three Dragons along with Lin Pao and Li Long.

115754.name: Anima Tactics: Kagemaru
115754.description: Kagemaru, the immortal shadow, is the legendary master of the Asakura ninja clan. This incredible fighter has come to the old continent, for the first time in his life, to establish contact for his clan with the organizations fighting for supremacy there.

115755.name: Die Umgebung der BASIS
rpgpublisher: Verlag für Fantasy- und Science Fiction-Spiele
115755.description:
Die Umgebung der BASIS is a sourcbook with more background information to the book: Die Basis. It also a good book to create more adventure after the Sternenwächter-Kampagne

It contains mostly information about new planets, system and races who lives there. Some more information about NSC at the BASIS are also included.

The book is free for download as pdf

---
user summary

115756.name: Korrutuskalake
115756.description:
"Korrutuskalake" is a simple math game for very little kids, to teach them multiplying in the range of 100.
In the game you have small river with a table for each number from 1 to 10, making it the multiplications of 1 to 100.
Each player on their turn roll 2 d10 dice and then have to quickly say the multiplication of the two and add their fish to the board, on the right number.

The winner is the player who manages get all their fish into the lake first.

115757.name: Rebuild of Evangelion: 3nd Impact
115757.description:
Rebuild of Evangelion + Rhythm Action = Synchronization Action as never seen before!

Break through all AT Fields with Evangelion and Synchronization!

Music and imagery from Rebuild of Evangelion add a unique appeal to this "personal experience" style game, giving a new level of synchronization with players. Bringing the world of Rebuild of Evangelion - 3nd Impact to the game...

To the eyes - a massive compilation of beautiful, high-quality character scenes.

To the ears - Shirou Sagasu's soundtrack has been boldly remixed by sound deisnger Akira Yamaoka specifically for this game. Including daring arrangements of the original songs, you can enjoy a new feel of rhythm action with more than 30 background tracks.

To the fingers - the imagery and music bring forth a grand symphony. The cool and stylish game design will accelerate players even further.

There are six kinds of mini-games:


Angel Session - Attack the Angel in time with the rhythm!
AT - Break through all AT Fields!
Hex - see glimpses of memorable character scenes!
Call of Fourteen - admire the character lines!
Teardrop - Run til you reach the objective! Run with all your might!
Number 5 / Beastie Girl - movies that show off lots of 3D models!


Source: The Game Website.

Note:
"3nd Impact" is read as "Sound Impact", from the pun on the Japanese word for 3 (san).

115758.name: Spielwelt (Issue 41 - Jul 1990)
rpgpublisher: Verlag für Fantasy- und Science Fiction-Spiele
115758.description: contains the adventure "Das Schandmal" and "Kanzlermord". Also an article about the new Questbook for Middle-Earth and some review for new Roleplay books.

115759.name: Vähendame võidu
115759.description:
The game about reducing the waste produced for The Environmental Board of Estonia.

Usual roll and move game where winner is the player who reaches first to finish. Player who landed space with logo must say before next rolling something about reducing or avoiding the waste.

115760.name: Ferda sordib pakendeid
115760.description:
There are 4 cards with different garbage can and 46 different packages for sorting the correct garbage cans.

Players place the cards from their hands for the garbage cans and write down their card numbers. If the deck is exhausted they check cards have they placed to correct garbage can.
Player who has played the most cards correctly is the winner.

115762.name: Frayed Kinghts
115762.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Frayed Knights: The Skull of S'makh-Daon is a 3D indie computer RPG featuring turn-based combat, old-school sensibilities, and a story of high adventure and comedy. Who says RPGs have to be so serious?

In a world of jaded heroes and veteran adventurers, you play a team of misfits: Arianna, a dainty warrior with an attitude problem; Dirk, an adrenaline-junky rogue who doesn’t seem to understand the word ‘subtle;’ Benjamin, a nature-priest and an ill-suited newcomer to the adventuring lifestyle, and Chloe, a ditsy sorceress with a love of cute, fuzzy animals and setting her enemies on fire.

Adventuring is always a dangerous profession, but recently things have gotten bad. Very bad. Teams of expert fortune-hunters are getting "morted," suffering great losses against enemies that are better prepared than ever. In the taverns and Adventurer's Guildhalls, whispered rumors speak of the return of an evil that once all but destroyed civilization. But as many great and famous adventurers fall to this growing threat, perhaps this bunch of losers - called "The Frayed Knights" (but never to their faces) - might just be the heroes the world really needs:

The wrong people at the wrong time.

115763.name: Levi
115763.description:
From the back cover:
Who's got the most extensive telecoms coverage? Who has the best quality? Whose coverage includes every village, town and city - right through to the most far flung corner of every region across the whole country?
COVERAGE! is a challenging and exciting board game where you have to develop your won telecoms network. Your playground is whole Estonia - so competition is fierce!

The telecommunications sector is developing rapidly: you have to be in it to win it, with victory going to a truly talented network operative - one who's able to plan several steps ahead, able to think big and act local, one who's not afraid of taking risks!

Elisa'a new board game COVERAGE! is a tricky, fast paced showdown between players who need to rely on both cunning and luck to win. The gauntlet has been thrown down: let the game begin!

Includes: game board, 60 game cards, 186 tokens, 15 coverage markers

115764.name: Tactyx
115764.description:
Tactyx is played on a 12 x 12 board. There are 4 coloured sections on each edge of the board. Diagonal moves are not allowed. To make this important rule visible all the time, the board is painted with 12 x 12 circles which are connected with vertical and horizontal lines (and no diagonal ones).

There are 2 red and 2 black banks on two opposing sides of the board. These bands are used to determine the coordinates of each place in a section on the board.

Each player has 6 tokens. At the beginning of the game the board is empty. By throwing the 2 dice, one red, the other black, the players determine the location where their tokens enter the game (in the section corresponding their color).

The goal of the game is to move all 6 tokens from the starting section to the diagonally opposing section. The first player who reached this, is the winner.

115765.description:
From the back cover:
"Eesti Laulude Mäng" (The game of Estonian songs) is a board game for ages 12+, although we are sure, that even a younger players can handle the game and find answers the adults cannot. So, one might say, that the game is meant for all ages just like the differential Estonian music. The can be played alone and as a team.

In this game you need to answer six different questions. Players move around the board according to the track drawn there and answering the questions according to the space they are standing on. Important thing is to keep a fun and happy attitude and even sing along with the songs. When a player suddenly finds themselves on Rock board on a Pirate space, the player must give up one card he had already won. The reason this game has a Pirate space is because in real life a lot of music is stolen as well, so hopefully this space has a small motivational purpose as not to steal music. We are sorry! The Pirate space will not affect a player who already has 6 cards. When players finds himself on a corner, then he can choose the category. You need to collect 6 different colored cards, this is how you win the golden record.
To win the game, you need to stand on one of the finish squares and the player to the left ask one question and this time you need to sing the answer. Get it right, and win the game.
115765.name: Eesti Laulude Mäng

115766.name: Re-bounder
115766.description:
User Summary

Sequel of Bounder, featuring similar gameplay (you move a bouncing ball on a scrolling landscape, avoiding traps and enemies while collecting power-ups. Levels end with a boss to fight and are not linear, but connected like a maze: you choose between up to three "exits" after completing each one).

It is a classical arcade of the '80s, offering a simple yet addictive gameplay and rewarding reflexes and memorization of patterns (of enemies and landscapes). Random bonuses and the non-linearity of levels offer some variety between plays.

115767.name: Ad Astra
videogameversion: Spanish ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
UK ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
115767.description:
From the instructions

Ad Astra - To The Stars - is the motto of the legendary Deep Space Patrol. There is little to occupy a pilot as he doggedly coasts from station to station...
...That is, unless you count the deadly phasers of the formations of Pirate battle-cruisers and their robot Scout ships, the multidirectional scatter bombs, the gigantic mine-layers of the Capellan Anti-Terran League, the almost impenetrable curtain of lethal mines and the fragmentation bombs, not to mention, of course, the ever-present interstellar debris that litters areas of space...

Note : If it moves, shoot it. If it doesn't move, shoot it anyway! Also, take a note of the security codes...

115768.name: Teadlik Tarbija
115768.description:
From the back cover:
Board game "Teadlik Tarbija" (Smart Consumer) got started in the Consumer Protection Department competition for school children named "We can do it". The game was designed by a Tartu Hiie school children and they presented it in 2005 for the named competition. All the art were made by a local school girl Cathlyn Olev (from Viimsi High 7th grade).

In the Tartu Hiie school all children there wither have a hearing or seeing disability. They say about the game they made like this:

"It was really hard to find the idea for the game at first. We looked at many different types of games and finally we thought to make something like Monopoly, but simpler. We thought, that a usual dice game with questions would be simple enough for us to do. We thought up the questions and made the cards. So that we wouldn't have to know all the answers, we made few cards with answers already on them, so we could move forward and backwards as well. The goal of the game is to learn about consuming and how to do it with reason!"

Game is played with dice rolls and answering questions. First person to reach the end, will win the game.

115769.name: Spielwelt (Issue 40 - Apr 1990)
rpgpublisher: Verlag für Fantasy- und Science Fiction-Spiele
115769.description: Contains one adventure for Midgard "Eine verhängnisvolle Erbschaft" and many short review of Roleplaying books. It also includes an article about drinking alkohol ingame.

115770.name: Isla Tetra 2
115770.description:
Self-published, hand crafted, and now available from: Solway Games: sargent254@btinternet.com

Following in the sandy footprints of Isla Tetra comes its card-driven 2-player cousin, Isla Tetra 2.

It’s been three days since that terrible event: The violent turbulence; the acrid smell of smoke; the sudden descent and then the panicked screams of other passengers. You’re in shock, hungry and disoriented. The shore is littered with debris from the crash, but what to do first? Food? Fire? Explore the island? Help!

Expert survivors will accrue more points during their time on Isla Tetra through cunning inventory expansion, clever health management, and successful completion of a set number of survival tasks. The game is played solo, or as a survival competition against the clock between 2 players - yes, it didn’t take long for an argument to break out over scarce supplies and resources, and now it’s a race to simply stay alive.

You might think you can get by, simply walking the sun-kissed sands hunting for red snapper, allowing the hypnotic effect of the crashing waves to ease your injuries, but as you soak up the sun events back home are taking a turn for the worse: As the months tick by, the search for your downed plane is eventually called off, your job is readvertised, and your car has been sold to keep up with the bills. After two years of waiting, your family holds a memorial service and your partner is now returning to a social life as a single person.

Players must strike a balance between plundering the island’s resources for points while ensuring they’re not last off the island to face the worst news once home (and the most penalty points). Each day you’ll beachcomb the golden sands to see what has been gifted to you from the azure, salty brine. Use this flotsam and jetsam, such as rusty cans and broken umbrellas, represented by chunky, 3D DriftCube shapes, to build a shelter, craft essential tools and a fishing spear; then explore deep into the island's heart. Link the same DriftCubes together on your playmat to ‘build’ action grids, such as exploring, fishing, and foraging for food. In these instances DriftCube shapes represent time as opposed to raw materials.

It’s a race for survival. It’s a race to get home...

"It's Ubongo meets Lost" - review comment

115772.name: Adder Attack
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release
115772.description:
From the instructions

Go treasure hunting on the ancient site which, according to legend, was the home of the goddess, Adderonia. Collect the gold nuggets, but watch the lethal blue snake who is also trying to collect and if given the chance will eliminate you.
Watch the other snakes, there are four in all trapped in various places on the site, the number increases to eight as the game proceeds, if they are released by you or the blue snake, they will attack, although they will not collect treasure. Adjacent to each trapped snake is a large sparkling
gemstone, worth initially 150 points (decreasing as game proceeds). Blue snake has valuable opals. Occasionally he drops one and should you collect it you pick up an extra 100 points.

115773.description:
5 promo cards for Mundus Novus.

Buron el catalan:
Scores each rounds as many points as the number of conquistadores he has, including himself ( merchants are not conquistadores)

Vicente de la raya:
Can convert same of a kind series to victory points instead of taking developments

Estefano guante:
Gets 3 victory points if he is trade master during trade phase

Sergio de lagio:
At end of supply phase, CAN pay 2 to take one card from the market. Replace this card by the first card from the drawing pile.

comptoir commercial (trading post):
Get 1 victory point for each merchant and each warehouse you have.
115773.name: Mundus Novus Promo Cards

115774.name: Anima Tactics: Kujaku Hime
115774.description:
Kujaku is one of the princesses of the Asakura clan in Lannet and
descendent of the goddess Michirokami. After accidentally releasing one of the Orochi seals, the young princess fled from her House in an attempt to atone for her fault. She wanders distant lands in search of some power which could stop the awakening of the Dark Aeon.

Light Wanderer Warrior -Lv. 50

At 5 | Dm 4 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP 13 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4

Lady of the Winds: Kujaku ignores all difficult terrain penalties.

Kusanagi No Tsurugi: Kujaku’s Hand-to-Hand attacks ignore armor. If the attack causes damage, target unit suffers Lv 2 Poison. Effect 13.

Orochi's Curse: At the end of every Maintenance Phase, throw a dice; with a result of 6+ put a Poison Counter on Kujaku.

o - Neokinesis (Ki, Effect)
Kujaku gains Lv 2 Haste. LIMIT: 1 per game.

ooo - Yamata No Orochi (Ki, Attack)
Kujaku attacks the same target twice.

ooo - Kaze No Nagi (Ki, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 Inch.). +2 Damage / -2 Armor.

ooo - Reigi No Ishizue (Ki, Charge)
If Reigi no Ishizue causes damage, the enemy unit suffers Lv 2 Seal. Effect 15.

A part of Team Kujaku Hime & Takanosuke along with Takanosuke.

115775.name: Anima Tactics: Li Long
115775.description:
Li Long, master and adoptive father of the Pao brothers, has initiated the search of his missing disciples after discovering the cause for the ir travel to distant lands.
Of course, he also finds this opportunity a great chance to test their skills against the warriors of foreign lands.

Neutral Wanderer Warrior - Lv 50

At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP 12 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5

o - Flow Like The Wind (Ki, Dodge)

+ 3 Defense. Flow like the wind can only be used against Ranged Attacks. It cannot be used if Long is executing a Shield maneuver.

ooo - Hundred Fist(Ki, Attack)

+ 6 Damage.

ooo - Gale of Blows (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack. If Gale of Blows causes any damage, the attacked unit loses one action point. Effect 15.

ooo - The Last Dragon (Magic, Attack)

+ 3 Attack / +1 Damage. Causes Throw.

A part of Team The Three Dragons along with Lin Pao and Jiang Pao.

115776.name: Adidas Championship Tie Break
videogameversion: English/European Amstrad CPC Floppy Disk edition
UK ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115776.description:
User Summary

Tennis game. Screen depicts about a quarter of the tennis court and scrolls with focus on the ball. Players can choose to tennis on either grass, clay or indoor court. Maximum numberof players depends on platform release; for C64 it was 4, simultaneously while for the ZX Spectrum 2 players.

You can play single or double, with the non-player slots taken up by computer opponents.

115777.name: Anima Tactics: Lin Pao
115777.description:
Cheerful and jovial, Lin Pao is a martial artist from Lannet who travels around the world to hone her combat skills. She loves combat and is always willing to test her Hundred Fist style with formidable opponents.

Neutral Wanderer Warrior - Lv. 35

At 5 | Dm 1 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP: 10 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5

ooo - Hundred Fists (Ki, Attack)
Special Impact. +6 Damage.

A part of Team The Three Dragons along with Li Long and Jiang Pao.

115778.name: Étoiles filantes
115778.description:
On a hexagonal game, two or three players must move their pawns and drive out competitors. Each piece has the potential to force and displacement different in each of its six sides, respectively 1, 6, 3, 5, 2 and 4. At each turn, you can either move or rotate a sixth one of his pawns to move into position to attack later. Étoiles filantes (Shooting Star) is also very interesting for three players. Players must then negotiate alliances point while being cautious of reversals that are sure to occur as soon as your partner suddenly find too threatening.

Object of the game is to remove opponent's pawns from the board.

The game has won the 1988 Golden Pawn Award in strategy games category.

115779.name: Goosebumps: HorrorLand
115779.description:
Marking the brand’s first foray into gaming consoles and handhelds, Goosebumps HorrorLand is an adventure game set in a fright-themed amusement park filled with over thirty thrilling rides and bone-chilling attractions. Sounds like fun…until players discover the scares are all too real and find themselves vanquishing vampires, hanging on for life on the Roller Ghoster and battling Certain Death. As players fiendishly try to escape the park, they will unravel a mystery, encounter a host of creepy horrors, monsters and mummies plus trademark Goosebumps twists and cliffhangers. Goosebumps HorrorLand will offer the suspense, pulse-pounding action, tension and humor that defines the franchise.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115780.name: Gormiti: The Lords of Nature!
115780.description:
Gormiti: The Lords of Nature! features characters and locations from the popular Gormiti TV show co-produced by Marathon Media & Giochi Preziosi. The action starts as a character named Razzle, while cleaning the library, accidentally knocks some old books into a Portal. These books tumble down to the Island of Gormiti where a never ending battle is going on between vast armies inspired by the elemental forces of nature. The books eventually land at the feet of Magmion, the evil Lava Gormiti. Magmion reads the book and learns of an old legend which talks about reuniting five sacred amulets which have been scattered across Gorm. Once reunited these amulets allow the holder to open an inter-dimensional portal to Earth! The Lords of Nature need to use all their unique powers to hinder Magmion plans and save Earth. The game recreates the beautifully illustrated island of Gorm, where the Lords of Earth, Sea, Air and Forest are charged with stopping the evil Magmion from wreaking havoc.

Features

- Engaging blend of puzzle, combat and FMVs propel the story forward. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies by applying your Gormiti's unique abilities and enjoy dazzlingly animated unlockable cutscenes featuring the original voice actors.
- Expansive story mode to discover. Traverse across 5 expansive domains, featuring locations from the television series as you put down Magmion's nefarious plot to put Earth and the parallel dimension of Gorm under his tyrannical rule.
- Vanquish your foes. Control each of the three Lords of Nature within a group and use the individual skills of each Lord to battle Magmion's minions using melee super attacks or powerful long-ranged moves, switching between characters and skills with ease.
- Tournament mode lets you prove your might! Unlock battle arenas to test your mettle against hordes of enemies in timed combat! (Wii only)

Source: The Publisher Website.

115781.name: Maximum Racing: GP Classic Racing
115781.description:
Ah…the good old days. In the golden era of the 1960’s, racing was at its finest. The cars were classy and rules were scarce! Think you can take a ride to the past and prove you have what it takes to beat the best of the best?

Put your driving skills to the ultimate test in GP Classic Racing. Get behind the wheel of high-powered, rear wheel drive cars that handle very differently than the modern cars of today! Featuring ten challenging circuits, a variety of racing modes, and unlockable bonus material, you won’t want to come back to the present day!

Features:

- Ten challenging tracks with bonus circuits along the way.
- Features powerful, rear wheel drive classic race cars.
- Multiple race modes for additional challenge.
- Unlock extras to help you race faster and beat the competition!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115782.name: Admiral Graf Spee
videogameversion: UK ZX SPectrum tape cassette release
115782.description:
Box back

A game based on historically accurate records of the Graf Spee's killer expedition in the North and South Atlantic.

An intermittent flashing pixel on your chart denotes the presence of an enemy ship in the Atlantic. The year is 1939. As Captain of the Admiral Graf Spee your task is to sink all enemy shipping in these waters using your six 11"guns and torpedoes. Search the area, locate the ship and using your instrumental display, which includes variable speed, compass headings, fuel, target distance, compass bearings, ammunition and torpedo state, manoeuvre into visual range ready for the kill. But the enemy can take evasive action - refuelling makes your position vulnerable and British cruisers and battleships are seeking to destroy you. To make your search and pursuit a constant challenge the enemy ships are relocated whilst you take on fuel.

7 levels of difficulty from EASY to PRACTICALLY IMPOSSIBLE.

Initially the display shows a map of the South Atlantic for you to locate targets. Once a target is located then by pressing "S=Search" the display will show the local area and the target vessel when in visual range. When you are within firing range the display will show the target being destroyed if successfully hit, and conversely your own damage state when the target returns fire.

Attacked targets can only be destroyed by approximately the same number of salvos or torpedoes as were necessary for the tonnage during the original action.

115783.name: Canada Hunt
115783.description:
Featuring intensely lifelike animals in their natural habitats, Canada Hunt for Wii boasts an impressive ammo selection, specialized training, and bonus modes that guarantee hours of entertainment.

Collect trophies as you advance through wildlife in search of elk, deer, spring gobblers and more. Activate “critter cam” for a third person perspective from the animal’s viewpoint. Breathtaking scenery and amazing detail punctuate each challenge, making Canada Hunt a surprisingly authentic depiction of real-life hunting environments. Includes Arcade Mode for fast-paced shooting action. Choose the gear you want and the weapons you prefer. With so many options, Canada Hunt is every hunter’s dream come true!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115784.name: Maximum Racing: Sprint Cars
115784.description:
Earn points in this exhilarating thrill ride for not only race position but flair and thrills! Incorporate powerslides, skids, and crashes to rise above the competition in a fierce battle for the finish! Sprint Cars for Wii features unlockable bonus features such as rare vehicles and awesomely challenging circuits, but you must work to stay ahead or your bonus game content will become locked again!

Think you can rise to the challenge? How about testing out your skills against your friends in a split-screen, head-to-head race over sand, ice, and snow? Now that’s power racing at its finest!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115785.name: Advanced Soccer Simulator
videogameversion: UK ZX Spectrum tape cassette release
115785.description:
From the instructions

This superb simulation offers all the thrills and heartbreaks of the real thing - from cup glory to nerve-wracking battles against relegation.

SETTING UP
Up to eight players can join the fun, each taking charge of one of the 80 teams featured, which are split into four leagues of 20 teams each. Before starting, you can select two or three points for a win. All players begin with a squad of 16 players, working for a team in the fourth division, and the aim is to get to the top of the pile.

THE SEASON
Each team plays 38 league games and takes part in both the League Cup and FA Cup competitions. League Cup games are played over two legs, the result being decided on the aggregate score from both legs. Cup matches cause some league games to be postponed until after the season.

115786.name: Truck Racer
115786.description:
Truck Racer brings you racing like you’ve never seen before! Tired of the same old racing games featuring the same old cars and monotonous tracks?

Truck Racer puts you behind some of the wildest, fastest, most dangerous vehicles on the open road…monstrous mega trucks!

Race big rigs, fire trucks, military vans, Hollywood APCs and pickups! They’re large, brutally fast, and will pummel anything that gets in the way!

In this intense racing competition, you’ll choose from 8 unique circuits in unique areas of the world. Try out various single player modes or gear up for extreme 2-player challenges where you’ll go head-to-head against other hard core truck drivers.

Truck Racer features day and night racing in a range of challenging environments. Race on both paved and dirt tracks loaded with steep curves and obstacles. But be careful – these vehicles handle much differently than the race cars to which you’re accustomed. When they crash, they really CRASH! Nothing is safe!

Compete against up to 7 opponents, win trophies and unlock extra features including new trucks, tracks and a bonus game mode.

The Game:

There are three main game modes to be played in Truck Racer – Race, Truck Challenge and Track Challenge. There is also a special mode to be unlocked – Dirt Track: Time Trial.

- Race Mode: Compete against seven other trucks in an unlocked truck of your choice on an unlocked track of your choice to score points and win trophies.
- Truck Challenge: Choose a locked truck and an unlocked track. Compete against the truck you chose and if you win, you will unlock that truck to be used in any mode.
- Track Challenge: Choose an unlocked truck and a locked track. Beat the set lap time to unlock the track you chose.
- Dirt Track – Time Trial: Unlock all trucks and tracks to reveal this special mode. Race against the clock in a unique vehicle, but beware of your opponent who will run right over you if you’re not careful!

Don’t miss the chance to pound your competition in some of the largest, craziest vehicles out there! Feel the thrill of high-horsepower, no-holds-barred trucks! Fast, massive, and unstoppable – this is Truck Racer!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115787.name: Kart Racer
115787.description:
Feel the rush as you race some of the fastest karts on the most challenging courses around the world. Kart Racer for Nintendo Wii takes you to the ultimate edge of competitive racing. These high-speed vehicles leave little room for error, so put on your driving gloves and get ready to test your skill!

Features:

- 15 courses from 7 different countries
- Indoor and outdoor racing in a range of challenging environments
- Three kart classes including 60cc, 125cc and 250cc Super
- Turbo Boost for that extra edge
- Multiple single and 2-player races
- Damage system including deformable bodywork
- Replay action – watch your race from any angle
- Trophy Room and bonus content including extra karts and tracks

Inches above the asphalt, you accelerate past the competition. Needle kicking off the redline, your adrenaline shifts into high gear. Raw, low-down, and dangerous: this is Kart Racer.

Take the wheel in the sport everyone’s talking about. Kart Racer features four heart pounding game modes that will leave you spinning!

Race Mode

Feel the intense pressure of high-speed racing at its best in Race Mode. Here, you’ll wind across some of the most intense tracks in the world. Improve your speed and skill to unlock bonus content that will benefit you in the game.

Knockout Mode

Take out other karts in an extreme battle for First Place. Use Turbo Boost to blow your competition off the road!

Challenge Mode

Test your racing abilities in numerous challenges that focus on technical turns and maneuverability.

Stunt Arena

Unlock this bonus game mode that challenges you to perform the wildest stunts imaginable! Earn more points for extreme flair and wild spinouts!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115788.name: Veggy World
115788.description:
Veggy World for Wii - Vegetables have never been this fun!

Your mission is to defeat the Evil Plants Army in this fun fantasy world made up of vegetables!

• Play Mission or Survival mode
• Use both the Wii Remote and Nunchuck to control your Strawberry plane and battle the Generals of the Evil Plants Army
• Surge though underwater, snow and desert conditions filled with monster fruits and veggies
• Upgrade your plane with components retrieved from destroyed enemies

In this wild and wacky game for Nintendo Wii, you will use a variety of impressive weapons to take out the Evil Plants Army and restore your planet to its peaceful existence:

• Homing Missile - Identifies, tracks and destroys enemy robots using advanced algorithms
• Mushroom Torpedo - Drops slightly and accelerates left or right to hone in on targets
• Laser Cannon – A devastating laser that can be fired in any direction
• Cactus Fortress – Mines that orbit the Strawberry plane, damaging anything that comes too close
• Solar Sphere - Unpredictable balls of plasma protected by a thin layer of steam
• Lightning Laser – A powerful current that arcs from enemy to enemy before dissipating
• Strawberry Missile - Drops quickly to the ground and accelerates left or right to destroy targets

Veggy World is unique in that players utilize both the Nunchuck and Wii Remote to steer, target and shoot. Your goal is to take out vicious enemies who are trying to destroy your planet, and save your fellow inhabitants from ruin. Featuring 21 humorously addicting stages, kids and adults alike will find Veggy World an entertaining game appropriate for all ages. Hours of gameplay are offered in two different modes:

Mission Mode

You will battle your way through one portion of the Evil Plants Army during each segment, defeating that region’s General at the end of your journey. Between segments, you will return to the nearest base, where your plane will be repaired and where you will have the opportunity to purchase upgrades.

Survival Mode

Fight for as long as you can without outside assistance. Scavenge certain essential components from enemy plants within the designated time limit and your plane will be automatically upgraded!

Source: The Publisher Website.

115789.name: Summon Night: Swordcraft Story
115789.description:
A great tournament has begun in Wystern to determine who will become the next seven Craftlords of Wystern and act as the guardians and councilors of the city. But the tournament features an unusual rule that has everyone in Wystern abuzz: only Craftknight apprentices under the age of 18 are allowed to enter! One of the tournament contestants is the child of Shintetsu, a legendary Craftlord who met a mysterious fate three years earlier. The child wants nothing more than to win the tournament and uphold the Shintetsu legacy, but the tournament is only the beginning of a saga that will lead to the uncovering of the darkest secret of all.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115790.name: Summon Night: Swordcraft Story 2
115790.description:
Welcome to the strange world of Lyndbaum, a sacred land linked to four magical dimensions. In Cliff, a village situated high atop a precipice, lay the ruins where the evil Summoned Creature Goura is confined. The ruins retain a terrible and hideous power, and as such, only a select few are allowed to enter the Chamber of Seals, let alone approach the ruin's entrance. One fateful day, a cheerful youth, having lost a little wager, guides a childhood friend to see the Seal of Goura. However, the true intentions of his friend emerge, and the wicked creature is released! To seal Goura one more time, a long lost sword is needed. The hunt for the Daemon Edge now begins.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115792.name: Street Fighter X Tekken
videogamehonor: 2011 Game Critics Best Fighting Game of the Year Winner
2012 Spike Best Fighting Game of the Year Nominee
2013 D.I.C.E. Fighting Game of the Year Nominee
115792.description:
User Summary

Street Fighter X Tekken is the first Street Fighter and Tekken crossover game. It features a large number of characters from both the Street Fighter and Tekken universes, each with their own Super Art and Cross Art.

The game is a two on two style tag game. When one character is KO'd, the round ends. There are a number of different gameplay mechanisms found in the game.

There are Super Arts (Super Combos), Cross Arts (both of your characters will perform their Super Arts on an opponent), Super Charge (you can charge a character's moves by holding the button down), Cross Assault (both characters are on screen and can attack the opponent), Cross Rush (a combo attack used by any character with the same button combination), and others.

The main new features of the game are the Gem and Pandora systems. Players will customize their two character teams with gems that alter speed, damage, and defense. Pandora is activated when a character reaches the final 25% of their life bar and provides a boost to attack capabilities.

The game also features a six button Street Fighter layout and a four button Tekken layout. Both button layouts will allow players to pull off many of the same combos and moves.

boardgameimplementation: The Big Bang Theory: Fact or Fiction Card Game
115793.description:
Get Ready to get your geek on as you test your knowledge from THE BIG BANG THEORY! Players answer trivia question, compete in rounds of "Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock" and draw their way to collecting a complete set of character cards!

Included are: Fact Cards, Fiction cards, Character Cards, Game board, 8 Playing Pieces, Die, Pad of Paper, and Comprehensive instruction manual.
115793.name: The Big Bang Theory: Fact or Fiction Game
boardgamefamily: TV Series: The Big Bang Theory

115794.name: MARCO POLO REISE-SPIEL Frankreich
115794.description:
Objective: collect as many bonus points as possible, but don't miss to be back home on time
- tactical (geographical) quiz - so called on back of box
3 phases - moving by turn - each player starts on his marked/coloured area
I move around collecting cards/images
II answer questions regarding images/cards you hold - if you fail discard card
III get back home (can be difficult) - don't miss the plane/boat
content:
1 board, 60 cards/images, 6 ports/cards, 20 red chips, 4 vehicles with stand-ups, 8 'double-sided' stones to point out directions, 2 rain slides, 1 die, 1 rule
3 similar editions existing for Germany, Italy & US

115795.name: Spin
115795.description:
SPIN. A solitaire game for the Shibumi set

Starting the game
The player starts with a given hand of marbles of diferent colours. The other balls remain in the bag and are used as a resource pool.

The turn
1. The player places one ball from his hand on the board.
2. If the marble touches another ball of a different colour, both balls are replaced with two balls (taken from the pool) of the other third colour.

Game end
The player wins if every ball from his hand is on the board and all of them are of the same colour.

115796.name: Ben 10: Galactic Racing (Wii/DS/3DS)
115796.description:
Ben 10: Galactic Racing's gameplay is somewhat similar to the Mario Kart series and Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing, with characters competing on race circuits based on different locations within the Ben 10 franchise and collecting power-ups called Omni-Nodes to boost their speed or hamper their opponents. The game features different types of stages or modes, including the Galactic Grand Prix (multi-track prixs that unlock characters and win trophies), Short Circuit (a custom prix of three tracks), Single Race, Time Trials (helps players unlock karts), Showdown (Ultimate Alienation, Omni-Tag and Ultimate Elimination bonus games) and Multiplayer.

Source: Wikipedia, "Ben 10: Galactic Racing", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115797.name: Shinseiki Evangelion
115797.description:
User Summary

Neon Genesis Evangelion is an FMV Adventure game that follows the events of the anime.

The player is presented with clips from the show and must direct the action by using the d-pad. Fighting the Angels involves mostly the same process, but the player has a few other options he or she must deal with. There is also a battle map of sorts that the player uses to direct the EVA's and fight the Angels.

115798.name: Marco Polo Reise-Spiel Deutschland
115798.description:
Objective: collect as many bonus points as possible, but don't miss to be back home on time
- tactical (geographical) quiz - so called on back of box
3 phases - moving by turn - each player starts on his marked/coloured area
I move around collecting cards/images
II answer questions regarding images/cards you hold - if you fail discard card
III get back home (can be difficult); don't arrive being the very last one; whatever you'd collected it doesn't count
content:
1 board, 60 cards/images, 6 ports/cards, 20 red chips, 4 vehicles with stand-ups, 8 'double-sided' stones to point out directions, 2 rain slides, 1 die, 1 rule
3 similar editions existing for France, Italy & US

115799.name: Beyond the Labyrinth
115799.description:
A dungeon-crawl RPG for the Nintendo 3DS in the visual style of ICO, with a real-time battle system.

Source: Wikipedia, "Beyond the Labyrinth", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115800.name: Gremlins Gizmo
115800.description:
Unleash Gizmo's fun-loving personality! Explore rooms, play games, dress up in costumes and unlock new things!

In Gremlins Gizmo, players can interact with and care for their very own pet mogwai. Choose Gizmo or one of his four cuddly friends and unleash their fun-loving personalities through nurturing interactions, exploration and discovery. Play dozens of games including retro style arcade games, music games, and hide and seek. Watch Gizmo sing and dance his way to new levels and earn trophies to unlock new costumes, new environments and additional mini and micro games.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115801.name: GTI Club Supermini Festa!
115801.description:
GTI Club Supermini Festa! shifts its way onto the Nintendo Wii and downloadable PSP® and PSP®go systems! Staying true to the original racing frenzy of the award-winning arcade game, players will race through the cityscapes of France, the UK, Italy, USA and Japan. Speed through tight bends and back roads of the urban sprawl, up steep mountainous roads and caves. Tackle a wide variety of driving conditions in the ultimate race to the finish!

Features

-Journey through 5 stages and 15+ courses: Race through open cities, tackle oncoming traffic and pedestrians, and journey through high mountainous roads (locations include France, UK, Italy, USA, Japan) to uncover new routes and secret courses
-Choose from a wide variety of Superminis: Drive 16 fully customizable cars based on the old classic arcade version plus all-new additions
-Drive with exceptional handling: Take to the streets in a Supermini to take on big jumps, tight turns, and secret shortcuts
-Enjoy online games: Compete online (via ad-hoc connection and ad-hoc party on the PSP) with 1-4 players in free for all events, team play, or a variety of party games
-Variety of customizations: Enter the garage, design your car from the ground up or tune your engine's performance

Source: The Publisher Website.

115802.name: The Wheel of Time Role Playing Game for the Fuzion System
115802.description:
From Introduction:

The Wheel of Time turns, and Ages come and pass, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth comes again. In one Age, called the Third Age by some, an Age yet to come, an Age long past, a wind arose. The wind was not the beginning. There are neither beginnings nor endings to the turning of the Wheel of Time.

But it was a beginning…

115803.name: Wildblades: The "Easy-Play" Fantasy Fuzion Rules
115803.description:
From Introduction:

This is your introduction to the exciting world of fantasy roleplaying in the Fuzion system. Using these rules, you can run or play in a fast-paced, versatile game in just a few minutes. Better still, characters created with these rules are fully compatible with full Fuzion games.

115804.name: State of the Art: 2073
115804.description:
Publisher blurb:

Some people think that being state-of-the-art means being on the bleeding-edge of technology. That's part of it, but only a small part. If you really want to be current, if you want to know what's going on in the world and how it might affect you, you need to know about a lot more than new tech. You need to know about current events—like the speech Hestaby gave to the United Nations that put the dragons of the Sixth World into an uproar. You need to know what you'll see on the roads, from new vehicles to re-purposed classics. You need to know about the latest research on Awakened plants and the exceedingly creative uses scientists are putting them to.

Take those elements and stir in up-to-date information on important people and places—like cagey intelligence ace Samantha Roth and the tumultuous nation of Thailand—and you have a dossier that can help runners stay current and make sure they know what's happening now in the Sixth World. Because the runner caught up in yesterday is a runner that's been left behind.

115805.name: Guiness World Records: The Videogame
115805.description:
Guinness World Records In Your Living Room!

Break records in your living room in a variety of stunts inspired by actual records found in the book. Compete in 36 wild and unique stunts as you take on family, friends and all challengers in your attempt to be the best! Go online and compare your score with players from all over the world, are you the world record holder? If you are the best, you could get listed in the official book of Gunniess World Records.

- With more than 35 different stunts based on real Guinness World Records, the whole family or a group of friends have a shot at becoming a record breaker
- Get listed in the actual Guinness World Records archives by earning the highest worldwide score on any stunt
- Travel the world to compete in crazy record-breaking stunts such as - Fastest Time to Crush Watermelons With Your Head, Fastest Time to Eat a Plane, Fastest Time to Shear a Sheep, and many more
- As you explore the globe, stand on specific hot-spots to reveal interesting facts about records that have been broken in that location
- Personalize your quest with your own customizabe avatar
- Collect fact cards and record breaking certificates on the campaign to become a record breaker
- Earn GWR Coins by performing well in record attempts and use them to buy items from the GWR Supplies Shop to gain access to more events

Source: The Game Website.

115806.name: Other Worlds
115806.description:
From publisher blurb:

Other Worlds is a roleplaying game of heroic action and adventure for any genre. The game is driven by description: descriptions of characters, details of actions, and dramatic visualisations. Numbers and dice rolls are secondary to the action; in fact, you will find that in Other Worlds the rules serve to emphasise the story and increase the drama rather than getting in their way.

This book contains the following material:

A comprehensive worldbuilding procedure that the whole group gets to take part in
Over 100 ready-to-use character templates, from assassins to xenoarchaeologists and everything else in between
Detailed guidelines on creating your own cultural archetypes, professions, trademark powers, supporting characters, and adventure locations
A simple, elegant conflict resolution procedure that can handle any situation
Turn-based set piece rules to handle the more important conflicts of your story
A wealth of practical advice on how to get the most out of play, based on real experience at the games table
Quick-start genre packages for fantasy, horror, pirates, science fiction, superheroes, and the wild west

115807.name: Gummy Bears Minigolf
115807.description:
Transport yourself to a wonderful fairy tale land full of color and cheer! Gummy Bears MiniGolf can be enjoyed by up to four friends or family members of any age, or on your own. Collect achievements, purchase unique Gummy Bear merchandise, and customize nine unique holes for a personalized adventure! Come play in the fantastic world of Gummy Bears!

Features

• Fun, lovable, colourful party game.
• Play with up to four.
• Customize up to 9 holes using the Gummy Bear course customizer.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115808.name: Gummy Bears: Magical Medallion
115808.description:
The Gummy Bears kingdom has fallen under the rule of the dastardly King Sour Berry! He has stolen the four mystical gems from the Gummy Bear Medallion. The magical medallion has for centuries kept the Gummy Bears Kingdom hidden from the evil king. You are the Gummy Bears only hope to save the Gummy Bears Kingdom!

Features

- Play through 12 sugar candy coated worlds
- 13 different achievements to unlock
- Classic adventure platformer with a Gummy Bears twist
- Full 3D environments and characters set with a 2D camera

Source: The Publisher Website.

videogame: Gunblade NY and LA Machineguns Arcade Hit Pack
115809.name: Gunblade NY
videogamecompilation: Gunblade NY and LA Machineguns Arcade Hit Pack
115809.description:
User Summary

In Gunblade NY, players control a gunship as they face off against the android terrorists attacking New York City. Players use the Light Gun Shooter to take out the enemies as they appear.

videogame: Gunblade NY and LA Machineguns Arcade Hit Pack
115810.name: L.A. Machine Guns: Rage of the Machines
videogamecompilation: Gunblade NY and LA Machineguns Arcade Hit Pack
115810.description:
User Summary

L.A Machine Guns: Rage of the Machines is a light gun arcade shooter. Players jump onto a futuristic gunship to take on the android invaders in the streets of LA.

videogame: L.A. Machine Guns: Rage of the Machines
115811.name: Gunblade NY and LA Machineguns Arcade Hit Pack
videogamecompilation: L.A. Machine Guns: Rage of the Machines
115811.description:
Two fast-paced and beloved arcade shooter games take you to the skies above some of America’s most well-known locales. Up to two players control machineguns on two flying battle vehicles to destroy an android terrorist invasion.

First, combat android invaders in New York City with your Gunblade helicopter gunship. Then, climb aboard a futuristic hovering gunship to battle a new force of android enemies in some of America’s most well known locales such as Los Angeles, Alcatraz, Yosemite and Las Vegas.

Wii Zapper™ compatible and a host of added Wii™ features like online leaderboards for worldwide ranking and Wii Remote™ vibration complete the experience.

Key features:

Two games in one value
Two classic arcade light gun shooters in one. Immersive pick up and play action in this arcade machinegun shooter extravaganza.

Play with a friend
Two player multiplayer mode for co-operative destruction. Check your worldwide rank against other players in online leaderboards.

Don’t think, Just shoot!
No need to reload with infinite ammo. Just like in the arcade - pull the trigger and blast away at android terrorist enemies and exploding objects strategically destroyed in the environment.

Zapper compatible
Combine with a Wii Zapper to repel the android terrorist invasion with pinpoint shooting accuracy.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115812.name: Greifenklaue (Issue 1 - 1998)
rpgissuearticle: LARP: How to build a weapon
115812.description: First issue of the german Fantasy-Fanzine of AD&D, Larp und much more about Roleplay. Including an adventure for Forgotten Realms and a short adventure for Ravenloft.

115813.name: Gunslingers
115813.description:
Professor Molina's train, the SteamBane, is rocketing through the canyons. The world's most powerful explosive is bolted to the engine. Only the four quickest guns in the West can stop them. Gunslingers supports up to four players in campaign mode, playing cooperatively or competitively, and in the include Trap Shoot and Survival modes.

Key Features

- Campaign Mode supporting 1 - 4 players
- Trap Shoot Mode supporting 1 - 4 players
- Survival Mode supporting 1 - 4 players
- Cell-shaded Steampunk-style visuals

Source: The Publisher Website.

115814.name: Hannah Montana: Spotlight World Tour
115814.description:
Take Miley's secret worldwide!

- Practice and perform Hannah’s hit songs using the Wii Remote
- Interact with dancers and the crowd to earn new fans
- Plan your tour schedule to include London, Paris, Tokyo, and more glamorous spots
- Shop for distinctive clothes and fashion accessories in each city
- Design ensembles using Hannah’s wardrobe and accessories
- Control a variety of lighting and stage effects for an unforgettable concert
- Share photos of your fashion designs in your scrapbook and record dances to share with friends

Go on a wild ride to pop-stardom as you help Hannah Montana win her greatest musical challenge yet. Tour the world as the pop princess herself and live the dream of rock stardom on stage and off while developing musical and fashion skills. Dance with your Wii Remote as Hannah dances with you on stage to earn devoted fans worldwide. Off stage, design the look of each show, including stage settings and wardrobe, and even special effects and pyrotechnics. With Lilly, Oliver, Jackson, and Robbie’s support during transitions and minigames, “it’s the best of both worlds” all around the world.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115815.name: Demonimancers
115815.description:
From Introduction:

Demonimancersn are those reckless souls who tap into the boundless power of the Flame. Not simple fire dancing merrily on logs in the hearth, mind you, but raw, pure chaos and destruction. The Flame is the mystical manifestation of Entropy, that force which seems the inevitable undoing of all that is. Alone, Entropy has both positive and negative effects; it can be said that Entropy leads to change, progress, and creativity, after all. However, Flame is tainted with the influence of the Demon Lords of the Abyss and their boundless minions. These creatures have adopted the Flame as their own, and it has changed to reflect their angry, hateful nature.
Demonimancers are those beings that work with and even worship these Demons; as such, they receive access to the fury and power of the Flame, but they also make themselves slaves to the wishes of their masters.

115816.name: Spawn Of Non-Terrifying Beasts of Legend!
115816.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to the Lazy GM Spawn of (Non) Terrifying Beasts of Legend. Within these pages we have taken the creatures from the original Non-Terrifying Beasts of Legend, updated them to Pathfinder, and added some entirely new horrors. Unlike other books in the Lazy GM series this product does not contain hundreds of statistic block variants. Instead, it is more in the line of a standard monster book. Fifteen pre-generated foes are contained within. All of them, with one exception, are created using only the rules found in the Pathfinder Reference Document (with some bending of what templates can be applied to). All of them can be used as the basis for an encounter, even a mini scenario in some cases. The question is, would you really want to?

115817.name: Happy Feet Two: The Videogame
115817.description:
Get your happy on!

Play as Mumble and his best friend Ramon as they dance, slide and race across Antarctica in a beat-bumping, feet-thumping, move-busting adventure to rescue their penguin nation.

Features

• Recruit other penguins to join your musical adventure
• Tap to the beat and charm enemies with your dance moves
• Get into the rhythm with a friend
• Features original music by GRAMMY award winning artist Ozomatli

Source: The Game Website.

115818.name: Non-Terrifying Beasts of Legend!
115818.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to the Lazy GM Halloween Special, (Non) Terrifying Beasts of Legend. Unlike other books in the Lazy GM series this product does not contain hundreds of statistic block variants. Instead, it is more in the line of a standard monster book. Ten pregenerated foes are contained within. All of them, with one exception, are created using only the rules found in the SRD (with some bending of what templates can be applied to). All of them can be used as the basis for an encounter, even a mini scenario in some cases. The question is, would you really want to?

115819.name: Blast Fighter
115819.description:
User Summary

Blast Fighter is a Shoot 'em Up game. A terrorist group is threatening the peace in Europe. You have to pilot a secret helicopter to counterattack and stop the terrorists.

The game has 6 level maps and 72 missions. You have a lot of different weapons to complete your mission.

115820.name: BRAWL (2011)
115820.description:
"Like Spit or Icehouse, players in Brawl do not take turns, instead either making a move or staying inactive as best suits their strategy at that moment. The game is fast-paced (games typically last a minute or two) but still has a fairly high level of strategy.

Each player has a different deck of cards. The object of the game is to win the most Base-cards by playing the most Hit-cards onto the Base before a Freeze-card is played on it. The game ends when a Freeze is being played on every Base in play. Player wins a Base-card if he has most Hits on his side of the Base. If both players have the same number of Hits on the Base, the owner of the Base-card wins the Base."

Source: Wikipedia, "Brawl (game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115822.name: Cards 3-in-1
115822.description:
User Summary

Cards 3-in-1 brings you 3 favorite classic games all in one app!

It has Solitaire, Solitaire Spider and Free Cell.

115824.name: Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion
115824.description:
A fighting game with similarities to the Super Smash Bros. series, this game allows up to four players (human or CPU-controlled) to control a Cartoon Network character and fight on multi-tiered 2D stages. Various items appear randomly to lend assistance to players, and stages also have features that can affect players. When players attack one another, glowing orbs appear; these fill a special meter that unleashes a powerful "Punch Time Explosion" attack against their opponents. For example, Dexter will summon one of his fighting robot suits and fire off devastating lasers.

Source: Wikipedia, "Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115825.description:
Campaigns in WW2 #2 Expansion Kit

As part of Army Group South’s effort in Operation Barbarossa, the Romanian 3rd and 4th Armies were tasked with covering the right flank of the offensive, clearing the area between the Dniester and Bug Rivers, and occupying the port city of Odessa. Axis planners hoped the badly outnumbered Soviet garrison in this area would collapse quickly, but the hastily assembled Independent Coastal Army managed to withstand 73 days of siege before being evacuated to the Crimea by the Black Sea Fleet, effectively gutting the cream of the pre-war Romanian Army in the process.

The Objective: Odessa expansion kit includes a map extension and additional units to cover the added area and forces that participated in this region during the campaign.

Note, Objective: Odessa is not a ‘stand alone’ game. You must own a copy of Objective: Kiev to use this expansion kit.

Game Data:

Complexity: 3 on a 9 scale
Solitaire Suitability: 7 on a 9 scale
Scale: Each unit is one German corps or Russian army, and each turn is approximately one to two weeks.

Game Components:

• Eight 5/8" square pieces
• One 8" x 11" map extension
• One Rules booklet
115825.name: Objective: Odessa

115826.name: Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion XL
115826.description:
A console port of the 3DS game Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion, this version of the game features new characters, stages, and gameplay modes.

Source: Wikipedia, "Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115827.name: Frogger 3D
115827.description:
In Frogger 3D, the player runs, dashes, and dodges moving obstacles and enemies in environments ranging from New York to the Far East to space. The character can jump onto and take control of bigger frogs, allowing some obstacles to be destroyed and lighting up dark areas. The game supports 4-player wireless multiplayer.

Source: Wikipedia, "Frogger 3D", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115829.name: Word Wave
115829.description:
Word Wave is the fast-paced game of word making and taking. This game challenges you to find words fast. Create words and shout them out as wave after wave of letter tiles launch from the device. Steal words from other players by adding letters to make new words. The player with the most points when the last letters launch, wins!

A switch on the side of the Word Wave machine lets you choose how often new letter tiles shoot out of the device. Each round lasts ten minutes or less.

115831.name: Barn yatzy
115831.description: Yahtzee variant with five colour dice instead of number dice. Unlike most such variants for children (for instance Yahtzee Jr. which in Swedish has the same name as this game), in this one you do not keep a record of categories chosen in previous rounds. Instead each round involves rolling and aiming afresh for one of five categories: two pairs (2p), three of a kind (3p), full house (5p), four of a kind (7p) or five of a kind (10p). After ten rounds, points are added up to determine the winner.

115832.name: Magic Garden
115832.description:
From the game box:
The princesses set out for a walk in the garden. What beautiful weather today and the flowers smell wonderful! Each princess wants to create the most beautiful bouquet - help a princess and find hidden in the garden wonderful and colorful flowers! The one who first arranges a fragrant, colorful bouquet - wins!

To win the game you need to collect 6 (2 players), 4 (3 players) or 3 (4 players) tokens with flowers on them.
Players move around the game board and trying to collect flower tokens, but not all tokens are good.
Broken branch - move 3 steps to which ever direction
Crown - miss a turn
Rubin heart - miss two turns
Shoe - stay until roll a 3
Roses - move 4 steps in free direction

115833.name: Snow White's Party
115833.description:
From the game box:
Snow White made a little party for her friends. She is still waiting for the seven dwarves, who are on their why home from the mines. Help the all get home as fast as you can. Road is long and Snow White is waiting them badly.
Snow White's Party - fun game on 3D game board.

Each player plays one dwarf and game is simple roll and move game. On the way to the house, there are many paths and on each path there are many spaces for a dwarf to land on.
Butterfly stone - roll more than 4, you get +3 moves, you roll less then 4, you miss 2 turn, you roll 1, you go back to the beginning.
White cloud - change places with who ever on the board.
Rabbit - +2 moves
Mushroom - -2 moves
Squirrel - miss a turn
Little bird - miss a turn
Evil witch - miss 2 turn
Sleepy - whoever reaches him first, must carry him with himself. Trick is that with Sleepy, you only move when you roll odd number (1,3,5), so be wise.

First player to reach Snow White, is the winner.

115834.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Osiris Codex
115834.description:
From the in-game instructions:

For the last week, the newspaper headlines have all been about the daring theft of the Leydon Papyrus, an early Egyptian work on chemical processes. Lara now receives an anonymous commission to retrieve a mysterious relic, the Osiris Codex, from a recently uncovered tomb. Surely there is a connection? The stolen manuscript is the earliest record of ancient Egyptian metallurgy, and Osiris (The Egyptian god of resurrection and eternal life) has always been inexorably linked with alchemy...

Run, jump, climb, shoot and think your way through a variety of levels, watching out for the traps, obstacles and enemies that will inevitably hinder your progress as you travel deeper underground in your search of the fabled treasures of Egypt.

115835.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Quest for Cinnabar
115835.description:
From the in-game instructions:

On returning from Egypt, Lara finds her anonymous employer wishes her to travel to Tibet immediately. Her destination is a nameless ancient monastery, which sits high on an escarpment. Lara must secure a priceless ancient vase containing Cinnabar, a substance used in the creation of life-affirming tinctures. Lara Croft is well aware that the supposedly mythical city of Shangri-La is actually rooted in Tibetan folklore, which describes a remote valley inhabited by immortals. Could this legend be linked to her latest adventure?

Run, jump, climb, shoot and think your way through a variety of levels, watching out for the traps, obstacles and enemies that will inevitably hinder your progress as you search for the fabled treasures of Tibet.

115836.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Elixir of Life
115836.description:
From the in-game instructions:

Following two dangerous missions to far off, mystical lands, Lara Croft now suspects someone is gathering together the ingredients required to formulate the fabled Elixir of Life. She may be sceptical of its actual potential, but nonetheless Lara is still reluctant to hand over the artefacts she has recovered. Instead she decides to discover for herself the real intentions of her clandestine employer. Lara's investigations lead her to the Scottish castle home of a billionaire recluse...

Run, jump, climb, shoot and think your way through a variety of levels, watching out for the traps, obstacles and enemies that will inevitably hinder your progress as you try to complete your adventure.

115837.name: Pendragon Gamemaster Characters
115837.description: This 58-page pdf-only product is intended as an expansion of the Great Pendragon Campaign, but is useful on its own merits as well. Containing statistics for over four dozen characters from all the periods of the full Pendragon campaign, Pendragon Gamemater Characters notably includes multiple versions of the same individual, such as King Arthur, to demonstrate how the character changes over the course of time. (From RPGNow.)

115838.name: NightStone
115838.description:
From the back of the box:

The stones align. The darkness rises. The time of heroes has arrived.

Embark on a quest to destroy The NightStone, following an epic tale that seamlessly blends Role Playing, Action and Strategy. Play as either Barbarian, Sorceress or Amazon as you seek to cleanse the land of evil, using sill, wit and courage.


Evade fiendish enemies as they track you by sight, sound and smell!
Choose your own path through over thirty sprawling adventures.
Quest with companions, or take on your enemies in an action-packed multi-player battle to the death!
Challenge your friends as you take on the roll of Dungeonmaster with the built-in NightStone Adventure Editor.

115839.name: SpellForce: Gold Edition
115839.description:
User Summary

A compilation boxset of the first SpellForce game and the first add-on pack for it.

115840.name: Spells of Gold
115840.description:
From the back of the box:

Explore, fight and trade your way across dozens of worlds, facing classic fantasy races and brand new creatures, in the greatest open-ended trading game since the 1980's classic Elite.

Game Features:


A dynamic economic model, simulating a hundred interlinked fantasy economies.
Full character-development: build your trading abilities, magical powers and combat skills.
Hundreds of optional missions and side-quests.
Over 100 Cities with scores of Fighting Schools, Temples, Guilds and Magical Academies from which to learn.
Grand politics, where the powers of good and evil hang in the balance.

115841.name: Carmageddon Splat Pack
115841.description:
From the back of the box:

MAX IS BACK!

The world wide number one smash'n'trash driving phenomenon is about to get a whole lot nastier...


Over 18 awesome new tracks
15 stunning new opponent vehicles
4 brand new environments including 'HELL'
More network levels including the 'Figure of 8'
Incredible 3Dfx version included
Advanced Red Eagle 2 and Hawk Deluxe


The carnage continues!

115842.name: Emergency Earth
115842.description:
Earth was attacked before by aliens but never this big. Citizen of earth now depends on your team, the one and only Earth Defense Force (EDF), the one who saves earth an hour ago from zombie attack to once again defend earth from danger. Emergency Earth is a solo game in which you took in charge to defend earth from danger

In the game player controls a group of army trying to blast the alien and defend earth from the invasion of aliens. The alien will emerge one by one from their mother ship. The map of the game is a strip of 5 column where the mother ship is on far right while the army is on the far left. Player is given a die at first to either use it to blast the alien or tries to get funding (money $). Money is used to get more dice hence more actions and other abilities like reroll and so on.

Visit us and play more games at http://experimentalplayground.blogspot.com/

115843.name: Fishing Resort
115843.description:
In Fishing Resort, players have complete control over their tropical island vacation. Each part of the island is open for exploration, with locales ranging from serene lakes and meandering streams to jungle rivers, sandy beaches, mountaintop frozen lakes, and the deep blue sea. Players can fish wherever there is water, giving them a wide array of options as they explore the game’s open world setting with rod and reel in hand.

Fishing Resort offers players a wide variety of fish. More than 200 unique marine creatures are available for players to catch and feature in aquariums at their hotel. As players catch fish, they exchange them for in-game credits that can be used to buy new fishing equipment and customizable clothing items. Fishing Resort also offers more than 20 mini games, including kayak races and fishing competitions, a deep achievement system, online leaderboards, and more.

A unique fishing rod attachment for the Wii controller is also available.

Source: The Publisher Website.

115844.name: Marvel Pinball
videogameversion: North American XBOX Live Arcade Version
115844.description:
Marvel Pinball features Marvel Comics-themed pinball tables. Otherwise, it features standard pinball game features: a launch plunger, flippers, and the ability to gently nudge the machine. Game tables become more complex as a player advances, opening new paths and opportunities.

Source: Wikipedia, "Marvel Pinball", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

115845.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad
115845.description:
Marvel Super Hero Squad features super-deformed cartoon version of Marvel Comics characters, as seen in the Marvel Super Hero Squad toy line and television show. The game has two modes.
